description: This report provides information on expenditures (i.e., cash transactions/payments) for the agencies that utilize the State Financial Management Application (SFMA) issued for the fiscal year 2011 (July 1, 2010 - June 30, 2011). See the Oregon Transparency Website Expenditure page for more detail: http://oregon.gov/transparency/expenditures.page

name: Expenditures: State Agencies: Fiscal Year 2011
